description: Federal law is clear: the attorney general may appoint only one interim US attorney before the role must be filled through Senate confirmation. The administration ignored that process entirely. Former selector Saba Karim criticized the captain's baffling decision-making, especially after tea when India desperately needed stability.  Pant's impulsive shot put the team in a precarious position, highlighting a lack of patience and judgment.

title: Taylor Swift’s Disney+ docuseries hit by Florida legal threat as Kelce stays silent
description: Taylor Swift's Disney+ docuseries faces a legal challenge from Florida artist Kimberly Marasco, who alleges copyright infringement. Marasco seeks to halt the release, claiming Swift used her poetry for lyrics and visual themes. Swift's team dismisses the claims as baseless, and legal experts deem an injunction unlikely, though the case sparks debate on creative overlap.

title: 'Jat Police at your service': Rajasthan remembers Dharmendra; chulha meals, Bikaner bonds live on
description: Dharmendra's deep connection to Rajasthan extended beyond his film career, encompassing loyalty and humility. As a former MP from Bikaner and co-owner of Amber Cinema, his generosity and emotional investment in relationships were legendary. His friendships, like the one with Vijay Punia, highlighted his simple nature and grace, even during his political tenure.

title: 'Silence with unbearable sound': Amitabh Bachchan mourns 'Sholay' co-star Dharmendra
description: Veteran actor Dharmendra, aged 89, passed away in Mumbai after a period of ill health. His final rites were attended by numerous industry stalwarts, including Amitabh Bachchan, who shared heartfelt tributes to the legendary star. Dharmendra's legacy, marked by his earthy charm and unwavering simplicity, was celebrated by colleagues and fans alike as the fraternity mourned his loss.

description: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff declared he's switching from ChatGPT to Google's Gemini 3.0 after a two-hour trial, citing significant improvements in reasoning, speed, image, and video processing. This endorsement highlights the intense competition in the AI landscape, with even OpenAI's CEO acknowledging Google's advancements.

title: Apple's warning to stores: Foreign SIM = penalty; store closure risk
description: Apple distributors are warning Indian retailers against activating new iPhones, especially the iPhone 17 series, with foreign SIMs within 90 days, citing hefty penalties and store code blocking. This crackdown follows a surge in iPhone 17 models being diverted to high-margin markets like Russia, Africa, and the Middle East, causing domestic shortages. Retailers are pushing back against this mandate, arguing it unfairly targets them.

title: Stefon Diggs’ partner Cardi B makes gold pendant from baby’s umbilical cord
description: Cardi B commemorated her fourth child's birth by transforming her umbilical cord into a gold pendant and her placenta into vitamins. This unique practice, offered by Mommy Made Encapsulation, also includes creating a "Tree of Life" placenta print. The service aims to preserve the initial bond between parent and child, a trend embraced by other celebrities.
